name: Space Troubles (_Maikha_)
description:
Welcome to space troubles, 

small shoot'em up game where you travel between the multiverses and avoid/shoot aliens 

to be honest, i procrastinated so hard that only 3 days were left for me

I'm tired

controls:

-arrows/wasd to move

-space/lmb to shoot

ps: the game isn't well optimized for web so there are dowloadables on the bottom, there's no mac cause... I have no idea how to export to mac

music: there is none

programming: maikha

sounds made using bfxr

(why did I participated in 2 jams at the same time ;0;)
